history.proof: intros a b c H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: plusA_eqA_comp_l. sauto.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs a c b H1).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term H1 : eqT a c H2 : eqT b c The term "a" has type "Term" while it is expected to have type "A".

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs b c a H2).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall a b c : Term, eqT a c -> eqT b c -> eqTerm a b -> eqTerm (plusTerm a c) (plusTerm b c)

Premises:
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
eqTerm : Term -> Term -> Prop
plusTerm : Term -> Term -> Term
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
eqT : Term -> Term -> Prop
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]

plusA_eqA_comp_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c : A, eqA a b -> eqA (plusA a c) (plusA b c)
multA_eqA_comp_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c : A, eqA a b -> eqA (multA a c) (multA b c)
multA_dist_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA a c) (multA b c)) (multA (plusA a b) c)

plusA_eqA_comp_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c : A, eqA a b -> eqA (plusA c a) (plusA c b)
divA_multA_comp_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA a (divA b c nZc))

eqA0_left : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a A0 -> eqA b (plusA a b)

multA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c0 d)
plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)

plusA_assoc : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c0)) (plusA (plusA a b) c0)

```coq
intros a b c H1 H2.
rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs a c b H1).
rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs b c a H2).
reflexivity.
Qed.

original: intros a b c H1 H2. rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs a c b H1). rewrite <- (plusA_eqA_comp_l A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs b c a H2). reflexivity.
